item.title: Garden waste against wall on Ferncliff Road, 3rd January
item.description:
Tennant of property seen clearing garden waste from garden and then dumping it over their garden brick wall into the street/ pavement on Ferncliff Road almost opposite 40 Ferncliff Road property. Garden waste dumped on 2nd January 2025.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Downs Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drug use and deliveries, 3rd January
item.description:
The corner of Hawthorn Road and Methuen has become a meeting point for drug addicts to use and meet their dealers. This must be addressed now! We have young children walking past this every day and it’s getting more and blatant. There is a camera situated on the lamp post which is totally ignored and obviously is t working. This needs to be addressed as a matter of urgency.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Methuen Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement is slippery, 3rd January
item.description:
I am a disabled resident with a disabled bay outside house who cannot walk unassited and lives alone.Pavement is very slippery and right side of Shepperton Road gets no sun so ice remains. Winter maintenance option missing from Bromley council/fix my street app.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eynsford Close, Crofton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
